GDipCEx

Extensions of several GDipC-Classes

Following classes exist:

- GDipCEx.Point

Handling 2-dimensional points

- GDipCEx.Rect

Handling 2-dimensional rectangles

- GDipCEx.Size

Handling 2-dimensional sizes (width and height)

Authors

hoppfrosch: Original

GdipCEx

Extension classes to GDipC as container for several helper classes

Authors

hoppfrosch: Original

Properties
version [get]

Version of the class

Remarks

  • There is no setter available, since this is a constant system property

GDipCEx.​Point

2-dimensional point, based on Class GdipC.Point Authors: hoppfrosch: Original

Functions
fromMouse()

Creates an new instance from current mouseposition

Example
pt := GdipCEx.Point.fromMouse()
toOpt()

Converts current Object into opt string to be used within AHK commands

Example
str := obj.toOpt()
Properties
version [get]

Version of the class

Remarks

  • There is no setter available, since this is a constant system property

2-dimensional rectangle, based on Class GdipC.Rect

Converts current Object into opt string to be used within AHK commands

Example

GDipCEx.​Color

Color, based on Class GdipC.Color

Authors

hoppfrosch: Original

Functions
newFromRGB()
Constructor

Fills values from given hex value

Parameters
hex

hex color string

Returns
